title: Brute force and finesse: new ways of shaping and forming materials
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation and Max Morgan-Witts
brief_description: Recent advances in manufacturing techniques, including electron beam welding, explosive forming, spark machining, hydrostatic extrusion, and cold forming are demonstrated in this film.
